table.name: vtiger_deliverynotes
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_deliverynotes` ( `deliverynotesid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `deliveynotessapref` VARCHAR(150) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`deliverynotesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_deliverynotescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_deliverynotescf` ( `deliverynotesid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`deliverynotesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
